data.name: Kingâ€™s Squire
data.passiveDescription: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by {{60//80//100//120//140}} for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal {{100//120//140//160//180%}} of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.
